results.title: The efficacy of metformin in pregnant women with polycystic ovary syndrome: a meta-analysis of clinical trials.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ therapy throughout pregnancy decreased the OR of @DISEASE_Abortion_Spontaneous @DISEASE_MESH:D000022 @@@EPL@@@, GDM, @DISEASE_Pre_Eclampsia @DISEASE_MESH:D011225 @@@PE@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Persistent_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000088562 @@@PD@@@ in pregnant @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with no serious detrimental side effects.

citations.NLM: Zheng J, Shan PF, Gu W. The efficacy of metformin in pregnant women with polycystic ovary syndrome: a meta-analysis of clinical trials. J Endocrinol Invest. 2013 Nov;36(10):797-802. PMID: 23580001
citations.BibTeX: @article{23580001, title={The efficacy of metformin in pregnant women with polycystic ovary syndrome: a meta-analysis of clinical trials.}, author={Zheng J and Shan PF and Gu W}, journal={J Endocrinol Invest}, volume={36}, number={10}, pages={797-802}}

results.title: Effects of metformin on pregnancy outcomes in women with polycystic ovary syndrome
results.text_hl: The OR was calculated as the ratio of events using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ over those using placebo or stopping using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Zeng XL, Zhang YF, Tian Q, Xue Y, An RF. Effects of metformin on pregnancy outcomes in women with polycystic ovary syndrome Medicine (Baltimore). 2016 Sep;95(36):e4526. PMID: 27603343

results.title: Combined effect of metformin with ascorbic acid versus acetyl salicylic acid on diabetes-related cardiovascular complication; a 12-month single blind multicenter randomized control trial
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ of control arm received usual @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Glucophage@@@) with Placebo once daily (blinded).

results.title: Effects of insulin, glimepiride and combination therapy of insulin and metformin on blood sugar and lipid profile of NIDDM patients.
results.text_hl: From the findings we can infer that in @<m>DISEASE_Persistent_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000088562 @@@long term diabetes@@@ treatment higher doses of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and combined therapy with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be more beneficial than with low doses of @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonyl urea@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: Valsaraj S, Augusti KT, Chemmanam V, Jose R. Effects of insulin, glimepiride and combination therapy of insulin and metformin on blood sugar and lipid profile of NIDDM patients. Indian J Clin Biochem. 2009 Apr;24(2):175-8. PMID: 23105828

results.title: Switch to rilpivirine improves diabetes in an elderly HIV-positive patient.
results.text_hl: We describe a case in a 72-year-old Caucasian man with @<m>DISEASE_Persistent_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000088562 @@@long-term HIV infection@@@.

results.title: Patient characteristics related to metabolic disorders and chronic complications in type 2 diabetes mellitus patients hospitalized at the Qingdao Endocrine and Diabetes Hospital from 2006 to 2012 in China.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: Inadequate control of hyperglycaemia, poor metabolic profiles and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Complications @DISEASE_MESH:D048909 @@@diabetic complications@@@ were common challenges for @<m>DISEASE_Persistent_Infection</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000088562 @@@long-term diabetes@@@ management in Chinese @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@.
